沈哲言 2013011371 叶子鹏 2013011404

proc_run代码入口

我们在proc_run 中加入了如下语句来获取保存在trapframe中的eip，然后输出eip对应的debug信息。

//line:220

            uintptr_t prev_eip = prev->tf? prev->tf->tf_eip:0;
            uintptr_t next_eip = next->tf? next->tf->tf_eip:0;
            if (prev_eip){
            	cprintf("prev proc: ");
            	print_debuginfo(prev_eip);
            }
            if (next_eip){
            	cprintf("next proc: ");
            	print_debuginfo(next_eip);
            }
            switch_to(&(prev->context), &(next->context));

原来的代码输出的都是syscall的位置，因为进程所做的事情都是系统调用（比如print和yield）

我们准备做如下这个测试：

我们让用户程序执行while(1)，来测试时钟中断，以此证明在任何地方都可以进行进程切换。

后来我们发现，

有一个方法，可以同时验证2个状态，包括：

1.系统调用syscall

2.时钟中断

我们输入：$make  priority 可以出现如下调试信息：

next proc:     kern/process/entry.S:6: <unknown>+0
next proc:     kern/process/entry.S:6: <unknown>+0
kernel_execve: pid = 2, name = "priority".
main: fork ok,now need to wait pids.
prev proc:     user/libs/syscall.c:19: syscall+72
next proc:     user/libs/syscall.c:19: syscall+72
in!
prev proc:     user/priority.c:37: main+149
next proc:     user/libs/syscall.c:19: syscall+72
in!
prev proc:     user/priority.c:20: spin_delay+15
next proc:     user/libs/syscall.c:19: syscall+72
in!
prev proc:     user/priority.c:20: spin_delay+15
next proc:     user/libs/syscall.c:19: syscall+72
in!
prev proc:     user/priority.c:20: spin_delay+15
next proc:     user/libs/syscall.c:19: syscall+72

其中spin_delay是由于时钟中断，syscall是由于系统调用。

            lcr3(next->cr3);
            if (prev->tf) {

            }
            if (next->tf) {
                cprintf("proc_run: next eip = 0x%x, trap eip = 0x%x\n", (next->context).eip, next->tf->tf_eip);
		print_debuginfo(next->tf->tf_eip);
            }
            switch_to(&(prev->context), &(next->context));

钱迪晨 2013011402 高思达 2013011413

在shed.c里面加上如下的代码，通过trapframe的eip获得。

       if (next != current) {
	   // 为了看到进程的切换过程，打印指针
    	   cprintf("schedule debug curr = %08x next = %08x\n", current, next);
           // 通过trapframe拿到用户态的程序运行指针
           if (current != NULL && current->tf != NULL) {
               cprintf("current eip print %08x\n", current->tf->tf_eip);
               print_debuginfo(current->tf->tf_eip);
           }
           if (next != NULL && next->tf != NULL) {
               cprintf("next eip print %08x\n", next->tf->tf_eip);
               print_debuginfo(next->tf->tf_eip);
           }

            proc_run(next);
        }

这里print_debuginfo是打印函数的内容的函数。

运行priority得到的结果

（make run-priority）

    user/priority.c:20: spin_delay+15
next eip print 00800fef
    user/priority.c:20: spin_delay+15

当前有5个进程在运行priority.c中的spin_delay函数，该函数一直在循环执行第20行的语句，因此每次切换时因为时间片用完，每次的位置都是该行。

通过打印各进程对应的proc_struct的指针，可以看到有多个进程在相互切换。

2012011366 尚智伟

 if ((next = sched_class_pick_next()) != NULL) {
        	print_stackframe();
            sched_class_dequeue(next);
        }

在sched.c里面的schedule()函数，在试图切换进程的时候低调用print_stackframe()打印程序运行的堆栈信息，以此来根据堆栈中的信息来跟踪程序的执行情况。

2013011509郭嘉丞

https://github.com/gjc13/ucore_os_lab/tree/lab6_spoc

在schedule函数的切换前后增加了打印trapframe中的eip的代码

改写proc_run如下，make qemu即可看到结果

void
proc_run(struct proc_struct *proc) {
    if (proc != current) {
        bool intr_flag;
        struct proc_struct *prev = current, *next = proc;
        
        if (prev->tf) {
            cprintf("Before:\n");
            print_debuginfo(prev->tf->tf_eip);
        }

        local_intr_save(intr_flag);
        {
            current = proc;
            load_esp0(next->kstack + KSTACKSIZE);
            lcr3(next->cr3);
            switch_to(&(prev->context), &(next->context));
            
        }
        
        if (next->tf) {
            cprintf("After:\n");
            print_debuginfo(next->tf->tf_eip);
        }
        
        local_intr_restore(intr_flag);
    }
}

proc_run()函数修改如下：

void
proc_run(struct proc_struct *proc) {
    if (proc != current) {
        bool intr_flag;
        struct proc_struct *prev = current, *next = proc;
	cprintf("Process Switch\n");
	if(prev->tf){
		cprintf("from pid %d %s 0x%x\n", prev->pid, prev->name, prev->tf->tf_eip);
		print_debuginfo(prev->tf->tf_eip);
	}
	if(next->tf){
		cprintf("to pid %d %s 0x%x\n", next->pid, next->name, next->tf->tf_eip);
		print_debuginfo(next->tf->tf_eip);	
	}
        local_intr_save(intr_flag);
        {
            current = proc;
            load_esp0(next->kstack + KSTACKSIZE);
            lcr3(next->cr3);
            switch_to(&(prev->context), &(next->context));
        }
        local_intr_restore(intr_flag);
    }
}

输出结果如下：

...
I am parent, fork a child pid 3
I am the parent, waiting now..
Process Switch
from pid 2 exit 0x8001d5
    user/libs/syscall.c:19: syscall+72
to pid 3  0x8001d5
    user/libs/syscall.c:19: syscall+72
I am the child.
...

肖迪     2012011306

修改sched.c中的schedule函数的切换部分，将切换前两进程的context和tf中的eip信息输出：

if (next != current) 
{
    cprintf("From %d to %d\n", current->pid, next->pid);
    if (current->tf) 
    {
        cprintf("pre position: tf:0x%x  context:0x%x\n", current->tf->tf_eip, (current->context).eip);
    }
    if (next->tf) 
    {
        cprintf("next position: tf:0x%x  context:0x%x\n", next->tf->tf_eip, (next->context).eip);
    }
    proc_run(next);
}

得到输出如下

From 0 to 1

From 1 to 2

I am the parent, waiting now..

I am the child.

waitpid 3 ok.
exit pass.
From 2 to 1
pre position: tf:0x8001d5  context:0xc010aeab
next position: tf:0x0  context:0xc010aeab

如果是中断造成的切换应该根据tf，若是同特权级之间的切换程序则是根据context

2012011307 黄必胜

在proc_run函数中，在switch_to调用前，增加相应的调试信息输出。
修改后的函数如下：

void
proc_run(struct proc_struct *proc) {
    if (proc != current) {
        bool intr_flag;
        struct proc_struct *prev = current, *next = proc;
        local_intr_save(intr_flag);
        {
            current = proc;
            load_esp0(next->kstack + KSTACKSIZE);
            lcr3(next->cr3);
            
            if (prev->tf) {
                cprintf("Prev proc info:\n");
                print_debuginfo(prev->tf->tf_eip);
            }
            if (next->tf) {
                cprintf("Next proc info:\n");
                print_debuginfo(next->tf->tf_eip);
            }           

            switch_to(&(prev->context), &(next->context));
        }
        local_intr_restore(intr_flag);
    }
}

张殿炎2013011328 叶方轲2013011340

在proc_run函数开头加入如下代码：

if(prev->tf)
	cprintf("prev proc: %d %s %x \n ",prev->pid,prev->name,prev->tf->tf_eip); 
if(next->tf)
	cprintf("next proc: %d %s %x \n ",next->pid,next->name,next->tf->tf_eip);

2012080060 甄显安   2012011308 陆喆

在proc_run()中加入如下代码：

if (prev->tf) {
	cprintf("Prev %s, pid: %d, tf->eip: 0x%08x, context->eip: 0x%08x\n", prev->name, prev->pid, prev->tf->tf_eip, (prev->context).eip);
	print_debuginfo(prev->tf->tf_eip);
}
if (next->tf) {
	cprintf("Next %s, pid: %d, tf->eip: 0x%08x, context->eip: 0x%08x\n", next->name, next->pid, next->tf->tf_eip, (next->context).eip);
	print_debuginfo(next->tf->tf_eip);
}

改写kern/schedule/sched.c中的schedule函数

if (next != current) {
	
    	{uintptr_t  eip= current->tf? current->tf->tf_eip: 0;

	cprintf ("current eip (tf->tf_eip): 0x%x \n", eip);
	cprintf ("\tpid: %d, proc name: \"%s\" \n", current->pid, current->name);
	cprintf ("\tcr3: 0x%x, kstack: 0x%x \n", current->cr3, current->kstack);
	print_debuginfo(eip);
	if ( (current->context).eip != eip ) {
	    uintptr_t  eip2=(current->context).eip;
	    cprintf ("\t\t(current->context).eip != current->tf->tf_eip \n");
	    cprintf ("\t\t(current->context).eip is 0x%x \n\t", eip2);
	    print_debuginfo(eip2);
	}}
	
	{uintptr_t  eip= next->tf? next->tf->tf_eip: 0;
	cprintf ("next eip (tf->tf_eip): 0x%x \n", eip);
	cprintf ("\tpid: %d, proc name: \"%s\" \n", next->pid, next->name);
	cprintf ("\tcr3: 0x%x, kstack: 0x%x \n", next->cr3, next->kstack);
	print_debuginfo(eip);
	if ( (next->context).eip != eip ) {
	    uintptr_t  eip2=(next->context).eip;
	    cprintf ("\t\t(next->context).eip != next->tf->tf_eip\n");
	    cprintf ("\t\t(next->context).eip is 0x%x\n\t", eip2);
	    print_debuginfo(eip2);
	}
	cprintf ("---------------------------\n");}
    
    proc_run(next);
}
